package array;

public class DynamicArray {

private String[] data;
private int count;
private int size;

public DynamicArray(int capacity) {
data = new String[capacity];
count = 0;
size = capacity;
}

public String[] expand(String[] data) {
if (count >= size) {
String[] newArray = new String[this.size * 2];
this.size = this.size * 2;
for (int i = 0;i < count;i++) {
newArray[i] = this.data[i];
}
return newArray;
} else {
return this.data;
}
}

public boolean append(String item) {
if (count >= size) {
this.data = expand(this.data);
}
this.data[count] = item;
count++;
return true;
}

public void printAll() {
for (int i = 0;i < count;i++) {
System.out.print(data[i] + " ");
}
System.out.println();
}

public static void main(String[] args) {
DynamicArray dynamicArray = new DynamicArray(5);
for (int i = 0;i < dynamicArray.size;i++) {
dynamicArray.data[i] = "This value is " + i;
dynamicArray.count++;
}
dynamicArray.append("This value is 5");
System.out.println("Now the size of data is " + dynamicArray.size);
dynamicArray.printAll();
}

}

public class Array {
private String[] data;
private int count;
privvate int size;
public Array(int capacity) {
data = new String[capacity];
count = 0;
size = capacity;
}
public boolean insert(int index, String value) {
if (count >= size) {
return false;
}
if (index < 0 || index > count) {
return false;
}
for (int i = count - 1;i >= index;i--) {
data[i+1] = data[i];
}
data[index] = value;
count++;
}
public String delete(int index, String value) {
if (count == 0) {
return false;
}
if (index < 0 || index >count) {
return false;
}
value = data[index];
for (int i = index;i <= count - 1;i++) {
data[i - 1] = data[i];
}
count--;
return value;
}

package main

import "fmt"

func mergeOrderedArray(a, b []int) (c []int) {
i, j, k := 0, 0, 0
mergedOrderedArrayLength := len(a) + len(b)
c = make([]int, mergedOrderedArrayLength)
for {
if i >= len(a) || j >= len(b) {
break
}

if a[i] <= b[j] {
c[k] = a[i]
i++
} else {
c[k] = b[j]
j++
}
k++
}

for ; i < len(a); i++ {
c[k] = a[i]
k++
}

for ; j < len(b); j++ {
c[k] = a[j]
k++
}

return
}

func main() {
a := []int{1, 3, 5, 7, 9, 10, 11, 13, 15}
b := []int{2, 4, 6, 8}
fmt.Println("ordered array a: ", a)
fmt.Println("ordered array b: ", b)
fmt.Println("merged ordered array: ", mergeOrderedArray(a, b))
}

public class FindMidNode {

// 1. T(n) = O(2*n) éå†2æ¬¡
public static Node findMidNode(Node head) {
if (head == null) {
return null;
}

int len = 0;
Node p = head;

while(p != null) {
len++;
p = p.next;
}

p = head;
for (int i = 0; i < len/2; i++) {
p = p.next;
}

return p;
}

// 2. T(n) = O(n) éå†1æ¬¡
// å¿«æ…¢æŒ‡é’ˆæ³•
public static Node findMidNodeFast(Node head) {
if (head == null) {
return null;
}

Node fast = head;
Node slow = head;

while (fast != null && fast.next != null) {
fast = fast.next.next;
slow = slow.next;
}

return slow;
}


public static Node createNode(int value) {
return new Node(value, null);
}

public static class Node {
public int data;
public Node next;

public Node(int data, Node next) {
this.data = data;
this.next = next;
}
}
}

/**
* 141. Linked List Cycle
* https://leetcode.com/problems/linked-list-cycle/
*/
public class LinkedListCycle {
public boolean hasCycle(ListNode head) {
if (head == null || head.next == null) {
return false;
}

ListNode fast = head;
ListNode slow = head;

while (fast != null && fast.next != null) {
fast = fast.next.next;
slow = slow.next;
if (fast == slow) return true;
}

return false;
}

public static class ListNode {
int val;
ListNode next;
ListNode(int x) { val = x;}
}
}

/**
* 206. Reverse Linked List
* https://leetcode.com/problems/reverse-linked-list/
*/
public class ReverseList {
public ListNode reverseList(ListNode head) {
if (head == null || head.next == null) return head;

ListNode pre = null;
ListNode next = null;

while (head != null) {
next = head.next;
head.next = pre;
pre = head;
head = next;
}

return pre;
}

public static class ListNode {
int val;
ListNode next;
ListNode(int x) {
this.val = val;
}
}
}

/**
* 21. Merge Two Sorted Lists
* https://leetcode.com/problems/merge-two-sorted-lists/
*/
public class Merge2SortedLists {
public ListNode mergeTwoLists(ListNode l1, ListNode l2) {
if (l1 == null) return l2;
if (l2 == null) return l1;

// åˆ©ç”¨å“¨å…µï¼ˆå‰å“¨èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼‰ç®€åŒ–å®ç°éš¾åº¦
ListNode outpost = new ListNode(-1);
ListNode temp = outpost;

while (l1 != null && l2 != null) {
if (l1.val <= l2.val) {
temp.next = l1;
l1 = l1.next;
} else {
temp.next = l2;
l2 = l2.next;
}

temp = temp.next;
}

if (l1 == null) {
temp.next = l2;
}

if (l2 == null) {
temp.next = l1;
}

return outpost.next;
}

public ListNode mergeTwoListsRecur(ListNode l1, ListNode l2) {
if (l1 == null) return l2;
if (l2 == null) return l1;
if (l1.val < l2.val) {
l1.next = mergeTwoListsRecur(l1.next, l2);
return l1;
} else {
l2.next = mergeTwoListsRecur(l1, l2.next);
return l2;
}
}

public static class ListNode {
int val;
ListNode next;
ListNode(int x) { val = x;}
}
}

func threeSum(nums []int) [][]int {
results := [][]int{}
n := len(nums)
if n == 0 || n < 3 {
return results
}
sort.Ints(nums) //é¦–å…ˆï¼Œå¯¹æ•°ç»„è¿›è¡Œæ’åº
for i := 0; i < n-2; i++ {
if i > 0 && nums[i] == nums[i-1] { //å¦‚æœç›¸é‚»ä¸¤ä¸ªæ•°ç›¸ç­‰
continue
}
target := -nums[i]
left := i + 1
right := n - 1
for left < right {
sum := nums[left] + nums[right]
if sum == target {
results = append(results, []int{nums[left], nums[right], nums[i]})
left++
right--
for left < right && nums[left] == nums[left-1] {
left++
}
for left < right && nums[right] == nums[right+1] {
right--
}
} else if sum > target {
right--
} else if sum < target {
left++
}
}

}
return results
}

public class List1 {

Node tail;
Node head;

public void addOneWay(int value) {
if (head == null) {
head = new Node(value);
tail = head;
} else {
Node node = new Node(value);
tail.next = node;
tail = node;
}
}

public void deleteOneWay(int value) {
Node node = head;
Node prev = head;
while (node.value != value) {
prev = node;
node = node.next;

}
if (node == head)
head = head.next;
else if (node != tail)
prev.next = node.next;
else {
tail = prev;
prev.next = null;
}

}



public Node reverse(Node node) {
Node prev = null;
Node now = node;
while (now != null) {
Node next = now.next;
now.next = prev;
prev = now;
now = next;
}

return prev;
}

public Node middle() {
Node nd = head;
Node nd2 = head;
while (nd2 != null) {
nd = nd.next;
nd2 = nd2.next.next;
}
return nd;
}

}

c[i]=b[k];
k++;

}else if(k==b.length){
c[i]=a[j];
j++;
continue;

}
if(a[j]<b[k]) {
c[i]=a[j];
j++;
}else {
c[i]=b[k];
k++;
}

}

return c;
}
}

public ListNode mergeTwoLists(ListNode l1,ListNode l2) {
if (l1 == null) return l2;
if (l2 == null) return l1;
ListNode head = new ListNode(0);
ListNode cur = head;
while(l1 != null && l2 != null) {
if (l1.val < l2.val) {
cur.next = l1;
l1 = l1.next;
}else {
cur.next = l2;
l2 = l2.next;
}
cur = cur.next;
}
if (l1 == null) cur.next = l2;
if (l2 == null) cur.next = l1;
return head.next;
}

public ListNode findCenter(ListNode head) {
ListNode slow = head;
ListNode fast = head;
while(fast != null && fast.next != null) {
slow = slow.next;
fast = fast.next.next;
}
return slow;
}

// time complexity: O(m+n)
// space complexity: O(m+n)

// An golang implementation of merge two sorted array, assuming both array in ascending order
func mergeTwoSortedArray(arr1 []int, arr2 []int) []int {
if len(arr1) == 0 {
return arr2
}
if len(arr2) == 0 {
return arr1
}

res := make([]int, 0, len(arr1)+len(arr2))

i, j := 0, 0
for i < len(arr1) && j < len(arr2) {
if arr1[i] <= arr2[j] {
res = append(res, arr1[i])
i++
} else {
res = append(res, arr2[j])
j++
}
}

res = res[:len(arr1)+len(arr2)] // grow length before copy
if i >= len(arr1) && j < len(arr2) {
copy(res[(i+j):], arr2[j:])
}
if j >= len(arr2) && i < len(arr1) {
copy(res[(i+j):], arr1[i:])
}
return res
}

// An golang implementation of dynamic array
func Append(arr []int, elems ...int) (newArr []int) {
oldLen := len(arr)
newLen := oldLen + len(elems)

if newLen > cap(arr) { // allocate a new double-sized array, copy existing elements over, then assign the new slice to arr.
newArr = make([]int, len(arr), (cap(arr)+1)*2)
copy(newArr, arr)
arr = newArr
}

arr = arr[0:newLen] // grow length to newLen
copy(arr[oldLen:newLen], elems)
return arr
}

public class DynamicArray {

//æ•°ç»„å®é™…çš„æ•°é‡
public int count;
//æ•°ç»„æœ€å¤§çš„å®¹é‡
public int capacity;
public String[] data;

public DynamicArray(int capacity){
data = new String[capacity];
this.capacity = capacity;
count = 0;
}

public void expand(){
capacity = capacity << 1;
String[] newArray = new String[capacity];
for(int i = 0 ; i < count; i++){
newArray[i] = data[i];
}

data = newArray;

}

public boolean insert(int index, String value){
//å› ä¸ºæ•°ç»„æ˜¯è¿ç»­å­˜æ”¾ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥insertæ’å…¥çš„æœ€å¤§ä½ç½®åªèƒ½æ˜¯æ•°ç»„æœ€åä¸€é¡¹çš„åä¸€ä½
if(index > count || index < 0){
return false;
}

//å®¹é‡å·²æ»¡ï¼Œæ’å…¥ä½ç½®åˆšå¥½æ˜¯æ•°ç»„æœ€åä¸€é¡¹çš„åä¸€ä½
if(count == capacity){
//æ‰©å®¹
expand();
}

for(int i = count - 1; i >= index; i--){
data[i + 1] = data[i];
}

data[index] = value;
count++;

return true;
}

public boolean delete(int index){
if(index > count - 1 || index < 0){
return false;
}

if(count == 0){
return false;
}

//ä»indexä½ç½®å¼€å§‹ï¼Œåé¢ä¾æ¬¡è¦†ç›–å‰é¢çš„å€¼ã€‚
for(int i = index + 1; i < count; i++){
//ç¬¬ä¸€æ¬¡è¿›å¾ªç¯i - 1çš„å€¼å°±æ˜¯ï¼ˆindex + 1ï¼‰ - 1 = index
data[i - 1] = data[i];
}

data[count - 1] = null;
count--;

return true;
}

}

*returnSize = 0;

*returnColumnSizes = (int*)malloc(sizeof(int) * (numsSize - 2) * (numsSize - 2));

while (nums[cur] <= 0 && cur < numsSize - 2) {

(*returnColumnSizes)[*returnSize] = 3;//è®°å½•åˆ—æ•°
returnArray[*returnSize][0] = nums[cur];

returnArray[(*returnSize)++][2] = nums[high];

while ((nums[low] == nums[++low]) && (low < high));//å¾€åå»é‡
while ((nums[high] == nums[--high]) && (low < high));//å¾€å‰å»é‡
}
else if (0 < (nums[cur] + nums[low] + nums[high])) {
high--;
}

}

}

}

return returnArray;
}

func (node *SingleNode) reverse() {
var pre *Node
var curr = node.head
for curr != nil {
tmp := curr.next
curr.next = pre
pre = curr
curr = tmp
}
node.head = pre
}

func merge(array1 []int, array2 []int) []int {
length := len(array1) + len(array2)
arr3 := make([]int, length)
i, j, k := 0, 0, 0
for {
if i == len(array1) && j == len(array2) {
break
}
if i == len(array1) {
arr3[k] = array2[j]
k++
j++
} else if j == len(array2) {
arr3[k] = array1[i]
k++
i++
} else {
if array1[i] > array2[j] {
arr3[k] = array2[j]
k++
j++
} else {
arr3[k] = array1[i]
k++
i++
}
}

}
return arr3
}

static int[] a;
static int num;
static int count = 0;
public ArrayLeetCode(int num) {
num = num;
a = new int[num];
}
public void addElement(int number) {
if(count / 0.75 >= num) {
reSize();
}
a[count++] = number;
}

private void reSize() {
int size = num;
num <<= 1;
int[] newArr = new int[num];
System.arraycopy(a,0,newArr,0,size);
a = Arrays.copyOfRange(newArr,0,num);
}

//ä¸¤ä¸ªæœ‰åºæ•°ç»„ï¼Œåˆå¹¶ä¸ºä¸€ä¸ªæœ‰åºæ•°ç»„
private int[] merge(int[] a, int[] b) {
int len = a.length + b.length;
int[] newArr = new int[len];
int i = 0 ;
int j = 0;
int k = 0;
while (a[i] <= b[j]) {
newArr[k++] = a[i++];
}
while (a[i] >= b[j]) {
newArr[k++] = b[j++];
}
while (i < a.length) {
newArr[k++] = a[i++];
}
while (j < b.length) {
newArr[k++] = b[j++];
}
return newArr;
}

public class FixedList<E extends Comparable> {
private static final int DEFAULT_CAPACITY=10;
private Object[] data;
private int capacity;
private int size;
public FixedList(){
capacity=DEFAULT_CAPACITY;
data=new Object[capacity];
}
public FixedList(int capacity){
this.capacity=capacity;
data=new Object[capacity];
}
//å¢
public boolean insert(E ele){
if(size==capacity)
return false;
int index = find(ele);
System.arraycopy(data,index,data,index+1,size-index);
data[index]=ele;
size++;
return true;
}
//æŸ¥
public E get(int index){
checkIndex(index);
return (E) data[index];
}
//åˆ 
public boolean remove(E ele){
int index=find(ele);
E e = get(index);
if(e.equals(ele)){
return remove(index);
}
return false;
}
//åˆ 
public boolean remove(int index){
checkIndex(index);
System.arraycopy(data,index+1,data,index,size-index-1);
size--;
return true;
}
//æ”¹
public boolean replace(E srcEle,E destEle){
if(remove(srcEle)){
insert(destEle);
return true;
}
return false;
}

private int find(E key){
if(size==0)
return size;
int lo=0,hi=size-1,mid;
while(lo<hi){
mid=(lo+hi)/2;
int compare=key.compareTo(this.get(mid));
if(compare<0){
hi=mid-1;
}else if(compare>0){
lo=mid+1;
}else{
return mid;
}
}
if(lo==hi)
return key.compareTo(this.get(lo))>0?lo+1:lo;
else
return lo;
}
private void checkIndex(int index){
if(index<0||index>capacity)
throw new IndexOutOfBoundsException("è§’æ ‡è¶Šç•Œ");
}
}

public static int getFirstMissingPositive(int[] nums){
int result = 1;

int[] arr = new int[nums.length+1];
for(int i =0;i<nums.length;i++){
if(nums[i] < arr.length && nums[i] > 0){
arr[nums[i]] = nums[i];
}
}
for(int j=1;j<arr.length;j++){
if(arr[j] == j){
result = j+1;
}else {
result = j;
break;
}

}

/**
* Definition for singly-linked list.
* public class ListNode {
* int val;
* ListNode next;
* ListNode(int x) { val = x; }
* }
*/
public class Solution {
public ListNode mergeTwoLists(ListNode l1, ListNode l2) {
ListNode dummy = new ListNode(0);
ListNode cur = dummy;
while(l1 != null && l2 != null){
if(l1.val < l2.val){
cur.next = l1;
l1 = l1.next;
}else{
cur.next = l2;
l2 = l2.next;
}
cur = cur.next;
}
cur.next = l1 != null ? l1:l2;
return dummy.next;
}

public ListNode mergeHelper(ListNode[] lists, int low, int high) {
if (low < high) {
int mid = (low + high) / 2;
ListNode leftList = mergeHelper(lists, low, mid);
ListNode rightList = mergeHelper(lists, mid + 1, high);
return mergeTwoLists(leftList, rightList);
}
return lists[low];
}


public ListNode mergeKLists(ListNode[] lists) {
if (lists == null || lists.length == 0) {
return null;
}
return mergeHelper(lists, 0, lists.length - 1);
}
}

}
return length + 1;
}

æ•°ç»„ - threeSum
func threeSum(nums []int) [][]int {
if len(nums) < 3 {
return nil
}

var results [][]int
sort.Ints(nums)

for i := 0; i < len(nums)-2; i++ {
if i > 0 && nums[i] == nums[i-1] {
continue
}

for j, k := i+1, len(nums)-1; j < k; {
if j > i+1 && nums[j] == nums[j-1] {
j++
continue
}
if k < len(nums)-1 && nums[k] == nums[k+1] {
k--
continue
}
sum := nums[i] + nums[j] + nums[k]
if sum == 0 {
results = append(results, []int{nums[i], nums[j], nums[k]})
j++
k--
}
if sum > 0 {
k--
}
if sum < 0 {
j++
}

}
}
return results
}

for i := 1; i < max; i++ { //ä»1å¼€å§‹çœ‹æ˜¯å¦åœ¨æ­£æ•°mapé‡Œ
if _, ok := m[i]; !ok {
return i
}
}
return max
}

public class MyArray {
Object[] object ;
private int capacity;
private int count;
MyArray(int capacity){
this.capacity = capacity;
this.object = new Object[capacity];
this.count = 0;
}
public Object get(int i) {
if(i<0 || i>=count) {
return null;
}else {
return object[i];
}
}
public int size() {
return this.count;
}
public int capacity() {
return this.capacity;
}
public void add(int j, Object o) {
if((count+1)>=capacity) {
Object[] ob = new Object[2*capacity];
System.arraycopy(object, 0, ob, 0, count);
this.object = ob;
this.capacity = object.length;
}
if(j < 0 || j > count) {
System.out.println("ä½ç½®ä¸åˆæ³•");
return false;
}
for (int i = count; i > j; i--) {
object[i] = object[i-1];
}
object[j] = o;
count++;
return true;
}
public void addFirst(Object o) {
if((count+1)>=capacity) {
Object[] ob = new Object[2*capacity];
System.arraycopy(object, 0, ob, 0, count);
this.object = ob;
this.capacity = object.length;
}
for (int i = count; i > 0; i--) {
object[i] = object[i-1];
}
object[0] = o;
count++;
}
public void addLast(Object o) {
if((count+1)>=capacity) {
Object[] ob = new Object[2*capacity];
System.arraycopy(object, 0, ob, 0, count);
this.object = ob;
this.capacity = object.length;
}
object[this.size()] = o;
count++;
}
public boolean delete(int index) {
if(index < 0 || index >= count)
return false;
for (int i = index + 1; i < count; i++) {
object[i-1] = object[i];
}
count--;
return true;
}
public Object[] list() {
Object[] o = new Object[this.size()];
for (int i = 0; i < o.length; i++) {
o[i] = object[i];
}
return o;
}
}

func mergeOrderedArray2(a, b []int) (c []int) {
c = make([]int, len(a)+len(b))

var i, j, k int
for i < len(a) && j < len(b) {
if a[i] <= b[j] {
c[k] = a[i]
i++
} else {
c[k] = b[j]
j++
}
k++
}

if len(a) > i {
c = append(c[0:k], a[i:]...)
}

if len(b) > j {
c = append(c[0:k], b[j:]...)
}

return c

}

type ArrayInterface interface {
Add(int, interface{}) // æ’å…¥å…ƒç´ 
Remove(int) interface{}
Find(interface{}) int // æŸ¥æ‰¾å…ƒç´ è¿”å›ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªç´¢å¼•
GetCapacity() int // è·å¾—æ•°ç»„å®¹é‡
GetSize() int // è·å¾—å…ƒç´ ä¸ªæ•°
IsEmpty() bool // æŸ¥çœ‹æ•°ç»„æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºç©º
}

type Array struct {
data []interface{}
size int
}

func NewArray(capacity int) *Array {
arr := &Array{}
arr.data = make([]interface{}, capacity)
arr.size = 0
return arr
}

func (a *Array) IsEmpty() bool {
return a.size == 0
}

func (a *Array) GetSize() int {
return a.size
}

func (a *Array) GetCapacity() int {
return len(a.data)
}

func (a *Array) Find(val interface{}) int {
for i, d := range a.data {
if d == val {
return i
}
}
return -1
}

func (a *Array) Add(index int, val interface{}) {
if index < 0 || index >= a.GetCapacity() {
panic("Add failed, index is illegal.")
}

if a.size == a.GetCapacity() {
a.resize(a.size * 2)
}

for i := a.size - 1; i > index; i-- {
a.data[i+1] = a.data[i]
}
a.data[index] = val
a.size++

}

func (a *Array) Remove(index int) interface{} {
if index < 0 || index >= a.size {
panic("Remove failed, index is illegal.")
}

removed := a.data[index]
for i := index + 1; i < a.size; i++ {
a.data[i-1] = a.data[i]
}
a.size--
a.data[a.size] = nil

if a.size == len(a.data)/4 && len(a.data)/2 != 0 {
a.resize(len(a.data) / 2)
}

return removed

}

func (a *Array) resize(newCap int) {
b := make([]interface{}, newCap)
for i := 0; i < a.size; i++ {
b[i] = a.data[i]
}
a.data = b
}

import "sort"

type OrderArrayInterface interface {
Find(val int) int // æŸ¥æ‰¾å…ƒç´ è¿”å›ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªç´¢å¼•

type OrderArray []int

//äºŒåˆ†æ’åºæ³•
func (array *OrderArray) Find(val int) int {
start := 0
end := len(*array) - 1

for start <= end {
middle := (start + end) / 2

if val > (*array)[middle] {
start = middle + 1
} else if val < (*array)[middle] {
end = middle - 1
} else {
return middle
}
}
return -1
}

func (array *OrderArray) FindAll(val int) []int {
indexs := []int{}
middle := array.Find(val)
if middle == -1 {
return indexs
}
//from middle to start
for i := middle - 1; i >= 0 && (*array)[i] == val; i-- {
indexs = append(indexs, i)
}

// from middle to end
for i := middle; i < len(*array) && (*array)[i] == val; i++ {
indexs = append(indexs, i)
}
return indexs

}

func (array *OrderArray) Add(val int) {
pos := array.findPosForAdd(val)
if pos != -1 {
*array = append(*array, 0) //æ‰©å®¹
for i := len(*array) - 1; i > pos; i-- {
(*array)[i] = (*array)[i-1]
}
(*array)[pos] = val
return
}

panic("cannot add")
}

func (array *OrderArray) findPosForAdd(val int) int {
len := len(*array)

if len == 0 || (*array)[0] > val {
return 0
} else if (*array)[len-1] < val {
return len
}

start := 0
end := len - 1

for start <= end {
middle := (start + end) / 2
if val == (*array)[middle] {
return middle
}

if val > (*array)[middle] && val < (*array)[middle+1] {
return middle + 1
}

if val < (*array)[middle] {
end = middle - 1
}
if val > (*array)[middle] {
start = middle + 1
}

}

return -1
}

from collections import defaultdict

class Solution:
def majorityElement(self, nums: 'List[int]') -> 'int':
count = len(nums)//2
result = defaultdict(int)

for num in nums:
result[num] += 1

for key in result.keys():
if result[key] > count:
return int(key)

class Solution:
def threeSum(self, nums: 'List[int]') -> 'List[List[int]]':
result = []

nums.sort()
N = len(nums)

for i in range(N):
if i > 0 and nums[i] == nums[i-1]:
continue

target = nums[i] * -1
s, e = i+1, N-1

while s < e:
if nums[s] + nums[e] == target:
result.append([nums[i], nums[s], nums[e]])
s += 1
while s < e and nums[s] == nums[s-1]:
s += 1
elif nums[s] + nums[e] < target:
s += 1
else:
e -= 1

return result

int * MergeArray(int a[], int n, int b[], int m)
{
if (n <= 0 || m <= 0)
return nullptr;
if (a == nullptr)
return b;
if (b == nullptr)
return a;

int *newArray = new int[n + m];
int i = 0;
int j = 0;
int k = 0;
while (i < n && j < m) {
if (a[i] < b[j])
newArray[k++] = a[i++];
else
newArray[k++] = b[j++];
}

while (i < n) {
newArray[k++] = a[i++];
}

while (j < m) {
newArray[k++] = b[j++];
}

return newArray;
}

ListNode* mergeKLists(vector<ListNode*>& lists) {
priority_queue<ListNode*, vector<ListNode*>, cmp> pri_que;
for (auto i : lists)
{
if (i)
pri_que.push(i);
}
if (pri_que.empty())
return nullptr;
ListNode* head = new ListNode(0);
ListNode* tail = head;
while(!pri_que.empty())
{
tail->next = pri_que.top();
tail = tail->next;
pri_que.pop();
if (tail->next)
pri_que.push(tail->next);
}
return head;
}

class Solution:
def get_minimum_node(self, lists:list) -> ListNode:
minimum = lists[0]

for item in lists:
if item.val < minimum.val:
minimum = item

return minimum

def mergeKLists(self, lists: 'List[ListNode]') -> 'ListNode':
k_value = []
dummy_ptr = ptr = ListNode(0)

for l in lists:
if l:
k_value.append(l)

while k_value:
'''get the minimum data from the list and append the next value into this list'''
node = self.get_minimum_node(k_value)
k_value.remove(node)

ptr.next = ListNode(node.val)
ptr = ptr.next

if node.next:
k_value.append(node.next)

return dummy_ptr.next

def hasCycle(self, head):
fast_ptr = head.next
slow_ptr = head

return False

fast_ptr = fast_ptr.next.next
slow_ptr = slow_ptr.next

class Solution {
public:
vector< vector<int> > threeSum(vector<int>& nums) {
vector< vector<int> > res;
int size = nums.size();
if (size < 3) return res;
sort(nums.begin(), nums.end());
for (int i = 0; i < size - 2; i++) {
if (i > 0 && nums[i] == nums[i - 1]) continue;
int target = -nums[i];
int p = i + 1, q = size - 1;
while (p < q) {
if (nums[p] + nums[q] < target) {
p++;
} else if (nums[p] + nums[q] > target) {
q--;
} else {
vector<int> v;
v.push_back(nums[i]);
v.push_back(nums[p]);
v.push_back(nums[q]);
sort(v.begin(), v.end());
res.push_back(v);
while (p < q && nums[p] == nums[p + 1]) p++;
while (p < q && nums[q - 1] == nums[q]) q--;
p++;
q--;
}
}
}
return res;
}
};

public class Array<E> {

private E[] data;
private int size;

// æ„é€ å‡½æ•°ï¼Œä¼ å…¥æ•°ç»„çš„å®¹é‡capacityæ„é€ Array
public Array(int capacity){
data = (E[])new Object[capacity];
size = 0;
}

// åœ¨indexç´¢å¼•çš„ä½ç½®æ’å…¥ä¸€ä¸ªæ–°å…ƒç´ e
public void add(int index, E e){

if(index < 0 || index > size)
throw new IllegalArgumentException("Add failed. Require index >= 0 and index <= size.");

if(size == data.length)
resize(2 * data.length);

for(int i = size - 1; i >= index ; i --)
data[i + 1] = data[i];

data[index] = e;

size ++;
}

// è·å–indexç´¢å¼•ä½ç½®çš„å…ƒç´ 
public E get(int index){
if(index < 0 || index >= size)
throw new IllegalArgumentException("Get failed. Index is illegal.");
return data[index];
}

// ä¿®æ”¹indexç´¢å¼•ä½ç½®çš„å…ƒç´ ä¸ºe
public void set(int index, E e){
if(index < 0 || index >= size)
throw new IllegalArgumentException("Set failed. Index is illegal.");
data[index] = e;
}


// æŸ¥æ‰¾æ•°ç»„ä¸­å…ƒç´ eæ‰€åœ¨çš„ç´¢å¼•ï¼Œå¦‚æœä¸å­˜åœ¨å…ƒç´ eï¼Œåˆ™è¿”å›-1
public int find(E e){
for(int i = 0 ; i < size ; i ++){
if(data[i].equals(e))
return i;
}
return -1;
}

// ä»æ•°ç»„ä¸­åˆ é™¤indexä½ç½®çš„å…ƒç´ , è¿”å›åˆ é™¤çš„å…ƒç´ 
public E remove(int index){
if(index < 0 || index >= size)
throw new IllegalArgumentException("Remove failed. Index is illegal.");

E ret = data[index];
for(int i = index + 1 ; i < size ; i ++)
data[i - 1] = data[i];
size --;
data[size] = null; // loitering objects != memory leak

if(size == data.length / 2)
resize(data.length / 2);
return ret;
}

// å°†æ•°ç»„ç©ºé—´çš„å®¹é‡å˜æˆnewCapacityå¤§å°
private void resize(int newCapacity){

E[] newData = (E[])new Object[newCapacity];
for(int i = 0 ; i < size ; i ++)
newData[i] = data[i];

}
}

/**
* å›ºå®šå®¹é‡æœ‰åºæ•°ç»„ï¼Œä»å°åˆ°å¤§æ’åˆ—
*/
public class FixedSortArr {
private int capacity;
private int size;
private int[] data;
public FixedSortArr(int capacity) {
this.capacity = capacity;
data = new int[capacity];
}

public int[] getInternalArr() {
return data;
}
public void add(int elem) {
if (capacity == size) {
throw new RuntimeException("æ•°ç»„å·²æ»¡");
}
int index = search(elem, "gt");
if (index == capacity) {
data[size++] = elem;
return;
}
System.arraycopy(data, index, data, index + 1, size - index);
data[index] = elem;
size++;
}
public void delete(int target) {
if (data[0] > target || data[size - 1] < target) {
return;
}

if (data[size - 1] == target) {
data[size - 1] = 0;
}

int index = search(target, "eq");
if (index == data.length) {
return;
}
System.arraycopy(data, index + 1, data, index, size - (index + 1));
data[size - 1] = 0;
}

public void update(int elem, int target) {
if (data[0] > elem || data[size - 1] < elem) {
return;
}

int elemIndex = search(elem, "eq");

int insertPos = search(target, "gt") - 1;

if (elemIndex == size) {
return;
}

System.arraycopy(data, elemIndex + 1, data, elemIndex, (insertPos - elemIndex));
data[insertPos] = target;
}

private int search(int object, String compareFlag) {
for (int i = 0; i < data.length; i++) {
if ("eq".equals(compareFlag)) {
if (data[i] == object) {
return i;
}
}
if ("gt".equals(compareFlag)) {
if (data[i] > object) {
return i;
}
}
}
return data.length;
}
}

First Missing Positive

class Solution {
/**
* Time complexity: O(n)
* Space complexity: O(1)
*/
public int firstMissingPositive(int[] nums) {
for (int i = 0; i < nums.length; i++) {
while (nums[i] != i + 1) {
if (nums[i] <= 0 || nums[i] > nums.length || nums[i] == nums[nums[i] - 1]) {
break;
}
int tmp = nums[nums[i] - 1];
nums[nums[i] - 1] = nums[i];
nums[i] = tmp;
}
}

int i = 0;
for (; i < nums.length; i++) {
if (nums[i] != i + 1) {
break;
}
}
return i + 1;
}
}

Linked List Cycle I

/**
* Definition for singly-linked list.
* class ListNode {
* int val;
* ListNode next;
* ListNode(int x) {
* val = x;
* next = null;
* }
* }
*/
public class Solution {
/**
* Time complexity: O(n)
* Space complexity: O(1)
*/
public boolean hasCycle(ListNode head) {
ListNode slow = head;
ListNode fast = head;

while (fast != null && fast.next != null) {
slow = slow.next;
fast = fast.next.next;
if (slow == fast) {
return true;
}
}
return false;
}
}

class Solution {
public List<List<Integer>> threeSum(final int[] nums) {
if (nums == null) {
return Collections.emptyList();
}

Arrays.sort(nums);

final List<List<Integer>> result = new ArrayList<>();
for (int i = 0; i < nums.length - 2; i++) {
if (nums[i] > 0) {
break;
}
if (i > 0 && nums[i] == nums[i - 1]) {
continue;
}
for (int j = i + 1, k = nums.length - 1; j < k;) {
final int sum = nums[i] + nums[j] + nums[k];
if (sum == 0) {
result.add(Arrays.asList(nums[i], nums[j], nums[k]));

while (j < k && nums[j] == nums[j + 1]) j++;
while (j < k && nums[k] == nums[k - 1]) k--;

j++;
k--;
} else if (sum < 0) {
j++;
} else {
k--;
}
}
}
return result;
}
}

public int[] mergeArray(List<int[]> arrayList) {
PriorityQueue<MergeNode> priorityQueue = new PriorityQueue();//javaçš„å°é¡¶å †
int totalNum = 0;
//åˆå§‹åŒ–å°é¡¶å †
for(int[] tmp:arrayList){
if(tmp!=null&&tmp.length>0){
priorityQueue.offer(new MergeNode(tmp));
totalNum = totalNum + tmp.length;
}
}
//ç»“æœæ•°ç»„
int[] result = new int[totalNum];
int index = 0;
while(priorityQueue.peek()!=null){
MergeNode mergeNode = priorityQueue.peek();
result[index] = mergeNode.getVal();
index++;
//å¦‚æœmergeNodeæŒæœ‰çš„arrè¿˜æœ‰å€¼ï¼Œé‡æ–°åŠ å…¥å°é¡¶å †
priorityQueue.poll();
if(mergeNode.hasNext()){
mergeNode.moveNext();
priorityQueue.offer(mergeNode);
}
}

return result;
}
static class MergeNode implements Comparable {
int index = 0;
int [] arr;
MergeNode(int [] args){
this.arr = args;
}
public boolean hasNext(){
return (index + 1<arr.length)?true:false;
}
public int getVal(){
return arr[index];
}
public void moveNext(){
index++;
}
@Override
public int compareTo(Object o) {
if(o instanceof MergeNode){
int t = this.getVal();
int t2 = ((MergeNode)o).getVal();
if(t>t2){
return 1;
}else if(t == t2){
return 0;
}else{
return -1;
}
}else{
return 1;
}
}
}

private Node reverse(Node root) {
if(root==null||root.getNext()==null){
return root;
}
Node nextNode = root.getNext();
//ä¿æŒnextNextèŠ‚ç‚¹
Node nextNextNode = nextNode.getNext();
//æ„é€ åè½¬åçš„åˆ—è¡¨
root.setNext(null);
nextNode.setNext(root);
//æŠŠnextNextNodeæŒæœ‰çš„é“¾è¡¨ï¼Œé€ä¸ªåŠ åˆ°ç»“æœé“¾è¡¨çš„å¤´éƒ¨
Node temp ;//è¾…åŠ©å¼•ç”¨
while(nextNextNode!=null){

nextNextNode.setNext(nextNode);
nextNode = nextNextNode;
nextNextNode = temp;
}
return nextNode;
}

package main

import "fmt"

type orderedArray struct {
data []int
size int
length int
}

func newOrderedArray(size int) *orderedArray {
return &orderedArray{
data: make([]int, size),
size: size,
}
}

func (o *orderedArray) add(e int) error {
pos := -1
for i := 0; i < o.length; i++ {
if e < o.data[i] {
pos = i
break
}
}

if pos == -1 {
o.data[o.length] = e
o.length++
return nil
}

for i := o.length; i > pos; i-- {
o.data[i] = o.data[i-1]
}

o.data[pos] = e
o.length++
return nil
}

func (o *orderedArray) delete(e int) error {
pos := -1
for i := 0; i < o.length; i++ {
if o.data[i] == e {
pos = i
break
}
}

if pos == -1 {
return nil
}

count := 1
for {
if pos+count < o.length && o.data[pos+count] == e {
count++
} else {
break
}
}

for i := pos; i < o.length-count; i++ {
o.data[i] = o.data[i+count]
}
o.length -= count
return nil
}

func main() {
aOrderedArray := newOrderedArray(10)
testData := []int{100, 38, 25, 40, 27, 16, 29, 81, 81, 7}

fmt.Println("unsorted array: ", testData)

for _, v := range testData {
aOrderedArray.add(v)
}
fmt.Println("sorted array: ", aOrderedArray.data[:aOrderedArray.length])

deletedElement := 81
aOrderedArray.delete(deletedElement)
fmt.Printf("delete element %d: %v\n", deletedElement, aOrderedArray.data[:aOrderedArray.length])
}

package main

import "fmt"

type dynamicArray struct {
data []int
}

func newDynamicArray(size int) *dynamicArray {
return &dynamicArray{
data: make([]int, size),
}
}

func (d *dynamicArray) enlarge(size int) error {
size = len(d.data) + size
data := make([]int, size)
for i, v := range d.data {
data[i] = v
}
d.data = data
return nil
}

func (d *dynamicArray) set(i int, e int) error {
if i > len(d.data)-1 {
d.enlarge(len(d.data))
}

d.data[i] = e
return nil
}

func (d dynamicArray) get(i int) (e int, err error) {
return d.data[i], nil
}

func main() {
size := 5
aDynamicArray := newDynamicArray(size)
fmt.Printf("create a array with initial size %d ", size)
for i := 0; i < 2*size; i++ {
aDynamicArray.set(i, i)
fmt.Printf("add to array index: %d value: %d ", i, i)
}

index := 2*size - 1
v, _ := aDynamicArray.get(index)
fmt.Printf("get element index: %d value: %d ", index, v)
}

func majorityElement(nums []int) int {
res := struct {
val int
times int
}{}
for i:=0; i<len(nums); i++{
if res.times!=0 {
if res.val==nums[i] {
res.times++
} else {
res.times--
}
} else {
res.val = nums[i]
res.times = 1
}
}
return res.val
}
3.æ±‚ç¼ºå¤±çš„ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªæ­£æ•°ã€‚ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦O(1)çš„åšæ³•ï¼Œæ˜¯åˆ©ç”¨äº†"æ•°ç»„å…¶å®å°±æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªç®€å•hashmap"çš„ç‰¹æ€§ï¼Œå¯ä»¥è®¤ä¸ºæ•°ç»„çš„ä¸‹æ ‡æ˜¯keyï¼Œæ•°ç»„çš„å€¼æ˜¯valueã€‚è¿™ä¸ªç‰¹æ€§èƒ½å¤Ÿé™ä½å¾ˆå¤šæ•°ç»„é¢˜ç›®çš„ç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦ã€‚
func firstMissingPositive(nums []int) int {
for i:=0; i<len(nums); i++ {
if nums[i] == i+1 {
continue
}
pos := i
for nums[pos] != pos+1 {
if 0<=nums[pos]-1 && nums[pos]-1<len(nums) && nums[pos] != nums[nums[pos]-1] {
swap(nums, pos, nums[pos]-1)
} else {
break
}
}
}
for i:=0; i<len(nums); i++ {
if nums[i] != i+1 {
return i+1
}
}
return len(nums)+1
}
4.ç¯å½¢é“¾è¡¨ã€‚è€ç»å…¸çš„é¢˜ç›®äº†ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨å¿«æ…¢æŒ‡é’ˆï¼Œè¿˜æœ‰ä¸€äº›ç±»ä¼¼çš„è¡ç”Ÿé¢˜ç›®ã€‚
func hasCycle(head *ListNode) bool {
if head == nil || head.Next == nil {
return false
}
fast := head.Next
slow := head
for fast.Next !=nil && fast.Next.Next !=nil && fast!=slow {
fast = fast.Next.Next
slow = slow.Next
}
if fast == slow {
return true
}
return false
}

func mergeKLists(lists []*ListNode) *ListNode {
if len(lists) == 0 {
return nil
} else if len(lists) == 1 {
return lists[0]
}
var result []*ListNode
for i:=0; i<len(lists); i=i+2 {
if i+1 == len(lists) {
result = append(result, lists[i])
} else {
result = append(result, merge2Lists(lists[i], lists[i+1]))
}
}
return mergeKLists(result)
}

public ListNode reverseList1(ListNode head) {
if (head == null)
return head;
ListNode dummy = new ListNode(-1);
dummy.next = head;
ListNode prev = dummy.next;
ListNode pCur = prev.next;
while (pCur != null) {
prev.next = pCur.next;
pCur.next = dummy.next;
dummy.next = pCur;
pCur = prev.next;
}
return dummy.next;
}

public ListNode mergeTwoLists(ListNode l1, ListNode l2) {
if (l1 == null){
return l2;
}
if(l2 == null){
return l1;
}
ListNode node1 = l1;
ListNode node2 = l2;
ListNode head;
if (node1.val <= node2.val){
head = node1;
node1 = node1.next;
}else {
head = node2;
node2 = node2.next;
}
ListNode prev = head;
while (node1 != null && node2 != null){
if(node1.val <= node2.val){
prev.next = node1;
node1 = node1.next;
}else {
prev.next = node2;
node2 = node2.next;
}
prev = prev.next;
}
if(node1 == null){
prev.next = node2;
}else if(node2 == null){
prev.next = node1;
}
return head;
}

public static Node findMiddleNode(Node list) {
if (list == null) return null;

Node fast = list;
Node slow = list;

while (fast.next != null && fast.next.next != null) {
fast = fast.next.next;
slow = slow.next;
}

return slow;
}
